description: Nothing but rolls of newspaper, used as an improvised club. Although it is easy to create, it is pretty fragile.
A smooth and sturdy staff with a leather-wrapped grip. Normally this is used to control a band, it could be as a mace-like weapon if needed.
A smooth and sturdy staff with a leather-wrapped grip.  Light and well-balanced, it is surprisingly easy to handle.  Enhanced with extra grip, it makes the weapon deadlier.
An umbrella, which is closed now. You can use this as an actual umbrella, if needed.

use_action.msg: You opened your umbrella, ready to shield yourself from rain.

description: An umbrella, which is opened now. You can use this as an improvised weapon, if needed.

use_action.msg: You closed your umbrella, ready to use it as an improvised weapon.

description: A thin and flat knife made for throwing.  Its ineffective cutting edge and odd shape makes it unsuitable for use as a tool. Plus, it is made from scrap, so it is quite unreliable.
A telescoping selfie stick that collapses for easy storage.  Makes a mediocre melee weapon.  Activate to expand.

use_action.msg: You snap open your selfie stick.

description: A telescoping selfie stick that collapses for easy storage.  Makes a mediocre melee weapon.  Activate to collapse.

use_action.msg: You collapse your selfie stick.

description: A katana-shaped machete, which has a crimson red grip.

hit_you_effect.message: Your wounds regenerate as you chop %2$s down.
hit_you_effect.npc_message: %1$s's wounds disappear as they chop %2$s down.

description: An oddly shpaed wood looking like a rifle, is called a gunstock due to its shape and useage of it. Was used by Native Americans. Also have a sharp point to pick some brains out.

A popular, fancy smartphone.  Capable of making photos due to integrated camera and illuminating an area as per flashlight app. The smartphone also has a clock app that includes an alarm.  Runs on a small, infinite power cell.

use_action.msg: You activate the flashlight app.
You deactivate the flashlight app.

description: A rock tied to some kind of rope, you can use this in an emergency.

A mass of scrap metal crudely beat into shape, with folded rags underneath to protect the wearers knuckles.  A good, quick weapon - but you have to get within punching range to use it. An integrated tazer will make the job easier, by shocking the enemies. Activate to skock them.
Folded camp chair, now bound with duct tape to use it as a weapon.  Somehow it is much lighter than the original.
A simple brass plated gong, this one emits a high noise.

player_descriptions: You play a little beat on your korean gong.
You play a beautiful rythm on your korean gong.
You play a piece on your korean gong that would sound harmonious with drums.

description: The karambit is a small Indonesian curved knife resembling a claw. It is one of the weapons commonly used in pencak silat and Indonesian martial arts.
A slender long rod of plastic cudgel, while traditionally intended as a tool for controlling traffic and people, it still makes a good melee weapon in a pinch.

use_action.msg: You turn the light baton on.
You turn the light baton off.

description: A thin and flat spade card made for throwing.
A thin and flat club card made for throwing.
A thin and flat diamond card made for throwing.
A thin and flat heart card made for throwing.

name: zapper grenade
description: Zapper grenade is an improvised grenade which, when pin is pulled, emits a cloud of electricity which can shock your enemies; but be careful, it will also shock you if you are nearby.

name: armed zapper grenade
description: This zapper grenade currently lost its pin, thus creating a dangerous electric field.

name: radioactive grenade
description: Radioactive grenade is an improvised grenade which, when pin is pulled, emits a cloud of radiation which can damage your enemies; but be careful, it will also affect you if you are nearby.

name: armed radioactive grenade
description: This radioactive grenade currently lost its pin, thus creating a dangerous radioactive field.

name: cryo grenade
description: Cryo grenade is an improvised grenade which, when pin is pulled, emits a cloud of liquid nitrogen which can damage your enemies; but be careful, it will also affect you if you are nearby.

name: armed cryo grenade
description: This cryo grenade currently lost its pin, thus creating a dangerous cryo field.

This is a typical household flashlight with a plastic handle.  Using this flashlight will turn it on and provide light, assuming it is charged with batteries. Since it is turned off, you can use this to crank your batteries.

use_action.msg: You turn the flashlight on.
You turn the flashlight off.

description: A model knife, made out of wood. Still a good weapon if needed, but will not last for long.
This is a digging tool. And a crowbar. And a saw. And more. Wow. Use it to dig pits, saw trees, and entry doors without permission.
Put a pickaxe head on a shovel. Now this is a digging tool. And a pickaxe. Wow. Use it to dig pits, break rocks, and entry doors without permission.
A smooth and sturdy staff with a leather-wrapped grip. This could be as a mace-like weapon if needed.

This is a long, thin object, usually made of wood, for writing or drawing, with a sharp black point at one end. You could use this as a weapon, but you aren't the jester or a professional killer. You have been warned.
A remote control for both RC cars, cars and robots. Debug only.
This is a compact and lightweight shaving and haircut kit made for travelers.  You can use it to shave or get your hair trimmed.
This is a compact and lightweight shaving and hygiene kit made for travelers.  You can use it to shave, get your hair trimmed, or wash things up.
A cleverly designed all-in-one tool which combines several smaller tools into a thick sized, card shaped plastic chunk.  Also holds a magnifying glass to start a fire.
This is a plastic bottle filled with cola and a candy.  Use this item to activate, which gives you six seconds to get away from it before it detonates.

use_action.msg: You activate the cola bomb.

description: This cola bomb's fuse is lit, and it will explode any second now.  Throw it immediately!

use_action.no_deactivate_msg: You've already lit the %s, try throwing it instead.

description: This is a printed guide to every trail, road, and buildings.

use_action.message: You add trails and trailheads to your map.

use_action.msg: You re-grab your crap trench knife, to use it as a knuckleduster.
You re-grab your scrap trench knife, to use it as a knife.

description: This is an inactive, and modified manhack.  Manhacks are fist-sized robots that fly through the air. This one has been modified to release healing gas, taze others, and shoot laser guns. Use this item to activate Enz.  Electronics and computer skill determines if the drone is activated successfully.

use_action.friendly_msg: Enz flies from your hand and surveys the area!

description: A broken Enz.  Much less threatening now that it lies limp on solid ground.  Could be gutted for parts.

This is an inactive, and modified manhack.  Manhacks are fist-sized robots that fly through the air. This one has been modified to taze others, and shoot laser guns. Use this item to activate attack drone.  Electronics and computer skill determines if the drone is activated successfully.

use_action.friendly_msg: The attack drone flies from your hand and surveys the area!
use_action.hostile_msg: You misprogram the attack drone; it's hostile!

description: A broken attack drone.  Much less threatening now that it lies limp on solid ground.  Could be gutted for parts.

name: heal gas grenade
description: Heal gas grenade is an improvised grenade which, when pin is pulled, emits a cloud of healing gas which can heal your allies; but be careful, it will also heal your enemies if they are nearby.

name: armed heal gas grenade
description: This heal gas grenade currently lost its pin, thus creating a soothing healing field.
This is a military combat axe.  It is light and extremely sharp, and could be deadly in either the right hands.
A baseball bat with several spikes driven through it, an excellent melee weapon.
A slender long rod of wood, while traditionally intended as a training tool for many dueling moves, it still makes a good melee weapon in a pinch. Upgraded with nails.

A small fad of the pre-apocalyptic world, created from coffee cherries through a complex process of seed removal, roasting, grinding, and brewing.  Coffee is substantially richer in caffeine than its rival tea.  With added sweet tea for better taste.
A metal weapon made of gold and jewels, designed to be gripped in the palm and cause punches to do extra damage.  A good, quick weapon - but you have to get within punching range to use it.
This is a military-grade high explosive hand grenade.  Use this item to pull the pin and light the fuse.  You will then have five turns before it explodes; throwing it would be a good idea.

use_action.msg: You pull the pin on the grenade.

description: This is an active high explosive grenade, and will explode any second now.  Better throw it!

use_action.no_deactivate_msg: You've already pulled the %s's pin; try throwing it instead.

description: This is a military-grade anti-tank hand grenade.  Short explosive range but high damage. Use this item to pull the pin and light the fuse.  You will then have five turns before it explodes; throwing it would be a good idea.

use_action.msg: You pull the pin on the grenade.

description: This is an active anti-tank grenade, and will explode any second now.  Better throw it!

use_action.no_deactivate_msg: You've already pulled the %s's pin; try throwing it instead.

description: This is a canister grenade filled with a crude variety of pyrotechnic chemicals.  Use this item to pull the pin and light the fuse, turning it into an active makeshift smoke bomb.  Five turns after you do that, it will begin to expel a thick black smoke.  This smoke will slow those who enter it, as well as obscuring vision and scent.
This makeshift smoke bomb has had its pin removed and is expelling thick smoke.
A remote-controlled car.  Fun for young and old alike.

use_action.msg: You turn the attack RC on.
use_action.need_charges_msg: The attack RC's batteries are dead.

description: This remote-controlled car is on, and draining its batteries just like a real electric car!  Use a remote control to drive it around.

use_action.msg: You turn the attack RC off.
use_action.need_charges_msg: The attack RC's batteries are dead.

description: This is a long and thin knife, hidden as a pen, with a spring-loaded blade that rests inside the handle while not in use.

A one-handed hatchet based on an acient tool.  Makes a great melee weapon, and is useful both for chopping things and smoking things. Since it is also used as a smoking pipe, this is weaker than an average hatchet.
This is a lockpicking kit, hidden as a pen.
This is a pen sized stungun, for spies' close quarters combat.

name: survivor's flare
description: This flare is unique, and when activated, sends some signal to bring some survivors.

name: active survivor's signal flare
description: This unique flare currently is activated, thus sending some signal to bring some survivors.

name: supply drop flare
description: This flare is unique, and when activated, sends some signal to bring some supplies.

name: active supply drop signal flare
description: This unique flare currently is activated, thus sending some signal to bring some supplies.
A one-handed bamboo hatchet.  Makes a great melee weapon, and is useful for chopping things.
This is a wooden stepladder.  Use it to set it down.
A wood stake with the far end cut down into a stabbing point.
This is a portable radio-like device.  If modified by a special person, you could change this useless item into something much useful.
This is a portable radio-like device.  Modified by a special person, you could call for help.  Throwing it also gives the same effect.

use_action.friendly_msg: A survivor got your signal and surveys the area!
use_action.hostile_msg: You send the wrong signal; the survivor is hostile!

description: This is a portable radio-like device.  Modified by a special person, you could call for help.  Throwing it also gives the same effect.

use_action.friendly_msg: A survivor got your signal and surveys the area!
use_action.hostile_msg: You send the wrong signal; the survivor is hostile!

description: This is a portable radio-like device.  Modified by a special person, you could call for help.  Throwing it also gives the same effect.

use_action.friendly_msg: A survivor got your signal and surveys the area!
use_action.hostile_msg: You send the wrong signal; the survivor is hostile!

description: A wooden box containing a set of round tokens used to play baduk.
An unknown syringe pack, with no label on it. Unpack and enjoy.
An unknown 3-syringe pack, with no label on it. Unpack and enjoy.
A sword, with a dark outline.

use_action.msg: The sword glows dimmly.

description:
A sword, with a dark outline. 

 <color_light_blue>My true mentor... 
 My guiding moonlight...</color>

use_action.msg: The glow of the blade darkens.

hit_you_effect.message: Your wounds regenerate as you chop %2$s down.
hit_you_effect.npc_message: %1$s's wounds disappear as they chop %2$s down.

description: A leather hand and arm wrap incorporating metal blades over the knuckles to improve punching power and defence.
A rebar crudely beat into shape, with folded rebar underneath to protect the wearers knuckles.  A good, quick weapon - but you have to get within punching range to use it.
A handmade baseball bat made out of a log.  Well-balanced, but bit hard to wield.
This is a medieval weapon consisting of a steel shaft tipped with a steel spearhead. Heavy but useful.
A thin and flat knife made for throwing.  Its ineffective cutting edge and odd shape makes it unsuitable for use as a tool.

Also called "lawyer Mr. Stun," this is a high-powered stungun.  Use this item to attempt to electrocute an adjacent enemy, damaging and temporarily paralyzing them.  Because the shock needs to be in direct contact, it is difficult to miss.
A deck of dos cards for a dos game.  Dos!

This is a rod mixed with high-powered stungun.  Use this item to attempt to electrocute an adjacent enemy, damaging and temporarily paralyzing them, then beating them up.  Because the shock needs to be in direct contact, it is difficult to miss.
This is a classic-looking mixtape-like item. Use it to make some noise.

This is a large, two-handed pickhead axe normally used by firefighters.  It makes a powerful melee weapon, but is a bit slow to recover between swings.  Better than the original, with rubber ergonomic grips and balanced handle.

This is a small and weird shaped coin.  One side is etched with the school icon and the other side reads a line of serial numbers.  Useless, and no one knows why this is made.  Only thing that is sure is that whoever made this made a lot, like a damn ton out of them.
This is a special agents-grade hand grenade, hidden as a pen.  Use this item to pull the pin.  You will then have three turns before it explodes; throwing it would be a good idea.

use_action.msg: You pull the pin on the penade.

description: This is an active penade, and will explode any second now.  Better throw it!

use_action.no_deactivate_msg: You've already pulled the %s's pin; try throwing it instead.

description: A tiny digital camera.  You can look at your photos on the tiny digital screen, or transfer them with a memory card.  Takes conventional batteries.
This is a couple of tools and planks, in order to reinforce doors and windows quickly.
This is a couple of tools and barbed wires, in order to place barbed wires quickly.
A large sledge hammer with a massive, heavy head and a crowbar at the other end.  This unwieldy tool is meant to break concrete, rock, brick, anything really.
This is a classic looking medieval sword, in between the lighter arming sword and later two-handed swords in size.  It requires a larger baldric or scabbard, compared to smaller swords.

name: poison mix
description: Improvised, unknown mix of poison.  It tastes horrible and dangerous too!
